item.title: Lessons learned from Management Reporter report distribution
item.description: Here are some helpful tips for using Management Reporter, especially for distributing reports: Utilize Security Groups in the Report Viewer for folder security whenever possible. You can create these groups on the Security page in Management Reporter. When setting up a folder in the Reports Library, grant access to the group (right-click on the folder and choose Report Library Permissions). Now, any user added to this group will automatically have access to these folders.
